markdownRemark.html:
This month in NottsJS we'll have Lightning Talks!

Come along to hear from members of our community, and share your own experiences if you like! Each talk will be 5 minutes each, with no theme (does not have to be JS).

You can make slides if you like, but there's no need to prepare, just get up there and talk to us for a few minutes. Hope to see you all there! ğŸ’›

We'll have food and drinks provided, courtesy of our sponsors, and go for a drink at Canalhouse to finish it off, as usual ğŸ™‚
